name: Stained Tooth
short_description: A Java based program that allows control of a computer via a bluetooth capable phone (Sony Ericsson t61x, 68i, P900/P800), using the Java Communications API.  Similar in function to PcControl and BTcontrol, but multiplatformed and opensourced.
